===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[full]]; [[filled]]; [[packed]]
#* {{zh-x|所有 的 停車場 都 '''滿''' 了。|All the car parks are '''full'''.}}
#* {{zh-x|這 篇 論文 '''滿''' 是 拼寫 錯誤。|This paper is '''full''' of spelling mistakes.}}
# [[fully]]; [[completely]]
# [[quite]]
# to [[reach]] the [[limit]]; to [[expire]]
#* {{zh-x|限期 已 滿。|The time limit has been '''reached'''.}}
#* {{zh-x|他 兒子 一 '''滿''' 18 歲，他 就 送 他 參軍 了。|He sent his son to join the army as soon as he '''reached''' eighteen.}}
# to [[satisfy]]; [[satisfied]]; [[contented]]
#* {{zh-l|滿意|satisfied}}
#* {{zh-l|自滿|self-satisfied}}
# [[Manchu]] ethnic group ({{zh-l|滿族}})
